name: Pay Pal
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), David H. Steinberg
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: When Homer ruins his and Marge's chances of making a new couple friend, Marge decides to concentrate on finding a friend for Lisa. However, Lisa suddenly makes a new friend on her own.
